sentences.en: A thong or strap used to fasten a shoe or sandal on the foot.
sentences.cn: 我花了两分钱就把一只凉鞋修好了.

sentences.en: Add a quilted bag and lacy white sandal and you ＇ re all set.
sentences.cn: 性感的吊带裙,褶皱边的露背式着装,棉质手提袋和白色蕾丝边的凉鞋肯定让你倍受关注.

sentences.en: Answer: That is the boulevard side to beat straw sandal, someone say long, someone say short.
sentences.cn: 答: 那是大路边打草鞋, 有人说长, 有人说短.

sentences.en: Can you fix my broken sandal?
sentences.cn: 我凉鞋坏了,你能给修修 吗 ?

sentences.en: Constant use had fretted sandal strap to the breaking point.
sentences.cn: 凉鞋由于经常穿,鞋带快磨断了.

sentences.en: During the Middle Ages, in the colder climes, the sandal gave way to more protective footwear.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪, 在寒冷的气候, 该凉鞋让位给了更多的防护鞋.

sentences.en: He patented a variation on the sandal.
sentences.cn: 他获得那种凉鞋的一种变化形式的专利权.

sentences.en: Lately, some large brand real estate agency corporations defalcate clients funds and break out fund sandal.
sentences.cn: 近来, 大型品牌房地产中介公司频频挪用客户资金,爆发“资金门”丑闻,引发了房地产中介行业的信任危机.

sentences.en: Metallic leather upper in a Roman two piece flat sandal style with a round open toe.
sentences.cn: 金属皮革上,在罗马两件式凉鞋单位的作风与全面开放的脚趾.

sentences.en: Moab is my washbasin, upon Edom I toss my sandal ; over Philistia I shout in triumph.
sentences.cn: 摩押是我的沐浴盆.我要向以东抛鞋.非利士阿、你还能因我欢呼麽.

sentences.en: NIV So the kinsman - redeemer said to Boaz ,'Buy it yourself.'And he removed his sandal.
sentences.cn: 8[和合]那人对波阿斯说: “ 你自己买吧! ” 于是将鞋脱下来了.

sentences.en: Recognising the sandal , he sought out Loki and began to beat him.
sentences.cn: 认出了那拖鞋, 他找到了洛基,然后开始打他.

sentences.en: Rosewood is classified into two sandal wood and padauk wood.
sentences.cn: 红木分为酸枝和花梨木两大类.

sentences.en: So when the kinsman said to Boaz, Buy it for yourself, he drew off his sandal.
sentences.cn: 8那亲人对波阿斯说, 你自己买罢; 于是将鞋脱下来了.

sentences.en: What wear wave shoe and beach sandal only is men's shoe.
sentences.cn: 只有穿波鞋和沙滩凉鞋的男式鞋.

trans.tran_en: a light shoe that is fastened onto your foot by bands of leather or cloth, and is worn in warm weather
